Reviews.Title: Dealer Not Detailed
Reviews.Author: aida campbell
Reviews.Content: I ordered this and as I opened the box, noticed there was no plastic wrap around the box, then opened up the box and the phones jack looked used...and it wasn't a Verizon phone, it was already used before with Sprint!!!? I figured well maybe its just me, either way took it to Verizon and they had a problem programming the phone..well, I decided to get all the guess work out. The phone was NOT NEW, but USED and it was NOT a Verizon Phone.Sent it back via Amazon. Love Amazon...they know what to do...I mean the phone was over 600.00  dollars why would anyone think people would not notice these things.They took it back, even apologized, well of course...Don't cheat honest people, not all of us are unaware of what we get!

Reviews.Title: At Last I Have a iPhone
Reviews.Author: SBranigan
Reviews.Content: No contract, unlimited data plan and a phone that works!The condition of the iPhone is great, I'm completely happy with this purchase.

Reviews.Title: Great job but....
Reviews.Author: Bug Lady "Bug Lady"
Reviews.Content: The seller did a really good job on shipping quickly.  I received the phone before the estimated due date which was great.  What wasn't so great was the condition of the phone.  It wasn't like new at all.  The bottom part where the charging port is was all dented.  There were also markings on the top part of the phone where the power button is situated.  Amazon's description of Used - Like New: An apparently untouched item in perfect condition. Original protective wrapping may be missing, but the original packaging is intact and pristine. There are absolutely no signs of wear on the item or its packaging. Instructions are included. Item is suitable for presenting as a gift.There were no instructions and no box.  The phone had been put in bubblewrap and shoved in a postage box with the accessories.  Additionally, the "free accessories" that were provided had seen better days.  The otterbox case was supposed to be white but it was so dirty and scratched it couldn't have been used.Now this may seem like I'm nit-picking but I really am not.  I expected a like new phone and didn't get one.  When you fork out $349 and it doesn't meet your expectations, it's very disappointing.  Not to mention the fact it's a lot of money.Overall the seller was understanding, although he stood by his description and said the condition is subjective and down to the end users interpretation.  Misleading in my book.  So the phone was returned and I did get a full refund - thankfully.

Reviews.Title: Awesome Phone!
Reviews.Author: amw7464
Reviews.Content: Once you go Apple you will never go Back! Best investment ever made! No problems with soft wear glitches and not getting messages. Def recommend to a friend.

Reviews.Title: 4S review
Reviews.Author: Sherry J. Minkis
Reviews.Content: needed a replacement and didn't want to play games with my cell provider. This was prompt, exactly what I needed and the price was right.

Reviews.Title: Great phone!
Reviews.Author: T. Wolfenbarger "Treena"
Reviews.Content: I love my 32 gb iPhone 4S! It is so easy to use and the Siri voice function is amazing. I enjoy to speak a text instead of typing.

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Taha
Reviews.Content: I like it it was like new  en everThing like what i expectedNo scratch no signs of use .

Reviews.Title: iPhone 4s32 gb
Reviews.Author: Yulia
Reviews.Content: Good phone for a reasonable price! The battery seems to work pretty well. Of course, I purchased a new unopened box iPhone 4s 32 gb. Quite satisfied w it.

Reviews.Title: Easy to operate
Reviews.Author: Troy
Reviews.Content: Great phone for someone who has never had a smart phone before. Easy to make calls, take pictures, send texts, and use the apps.

Reviews.Title: was a scam...battery was bad in phone
Reviews.Author: Jennifer Towers
Reviews.Content: I definitely got scammed on this one. I immediately took the phone to veriozon to be checked out and all seemed good but the battery was shot.

Reviews.Title: Phone was exactly what I expected
Reviews.Author: Gina Craig
Reviews.Content: The phone was in the best shape I have ever seen for a used phone.  It looked like it had never been taken out of the box.  worked with Verizon just like it claimed.  And it was reset when it come so all I had to do was turn it on and plug in my itunes account info.  I could not be happier with this phone.  Highly recommended!

Reviews.Title: iphone 4s
Reviews.Author: Jasmine
Reviews.Content: I like it.  Thanks!  Happy Holidays to you too.!! :)  I really appreciate it.  Best Christmas Gift so far to myself.

Reviews.Title: The popular iPhone is still a top competitor
Reviews.Author: jonathan
Reviews.Content: What can I say about my phone? In fact, I'm using it right now! What's much to say about it?I absolutely love my phone. Although I'm not very fond of apple's products, but this phone is very versatile. Many people who hate iphones have androids, droids, google phones, etc. What it boils down to is that the iPhone is very simple and easy to use. It's very hard to get confused using this phone, and it could do just about anything any other phones can do. Besides, aren't all phones about the same these days? Nothing much is different, but phones being smaller, faster, differently colored, slightly better camera, etc. They're all the same thing.

Reviews.Title: Excellent product and shipping
Reviews.Author: Deal Hunter
Reviews.Content: I bought a used one, but condition is very good like new as described, love it, will recommend  it to my friends.

Reviews.Title: LOVE!
Reviews.Author: Diana
Reviews.Content: I bought my first iPhone off of Amazon back in January and I still have it- NO problems with it- Good as brand new!  I traded it out for my old phone on my Verizon plan way before my 2-year-upgrade was due (because really, who can wait that long?!).  Worked like a charm.  Highly recommend.

Reviews.Title: It's perfect- thank you!
Reviews.Author: L. Gomez "mei_iro"
Reviews.Content: I was hesitant to purchase an iPhone (to replace my previously stolen one) online, but I contacted the seller the he was extremely helpful and understanding. I went through with my purchase, and it didn't take long to get here. It arrived in the promised condition and still use it to this day. I'm very happy with my purchase and with this seller. Definitely returning again!

Reviews.Title: Amazing phone
Reviews.Author: Ian
Reviews.Content: Awesome phone! Even better than expected. Very sleak, clean and it had a great screen. Huge upgrade from my previous flip phone. Still learning how to use the phone but already downloaded approximately 15 apps and all downloaded extremely fast and had no issues. This phone is a great tool for your life!

Reviews.Title: Good job Iwolstein. The phone is in the right condition as it displayed
Reviews.Author: Nhan H.
Reviews.Content: Good job Iwolstein.This Iphone 4s is great.The phone is in the right condition as it displayedI hope everyone could enjoy ....

Reviews.Title: Love this phone
Reviews.Author: Rachy
Reviews.Content: Bought this phone because I ran out of space on my iPhone 4. Love this phone! No complaints at all

Reviews.Title: Fantastic
Reviews.Author: Jeff Luhr
Reviews.Content: The price was right, the packaging was amazing (literally 4 packages inside each other for protection) and the phone works perfectly.  Could not have asked for anything better!

Reviews.Title: iPhone 4s
Reviews.Author: P. Truby
Reviews.Content: Works perfect, wife destroyed her first iPhone and we did not have insurance on it.  So bought a used iPhone and it is working great and this time I got insurance for this one.

Reviews.Title: Great Phone!!!!
Reviews.Author: Erin Jones
Reviews.Content: We purchased this phone for my daughter for Christmas. It was immaculate! The description of the phone was accurate, and the delivery was timely. It was a late order, and I was worried that it would not be here by Christmas-but thankfully it did! We have had no issues or concerns with the phone, and my daughter loves it. Thank you so much for your honesty and integrity as it relates to your online store. I will definitely look to you for any additional needs!

Reviews.Title: iphone
Reviews.Author: Fran Lamothe
Reviews.Content: quick to ship my iphonethe phone works greatcame with the accessorieskept their promisesi recommend this product

Reviews.Title: It's a phone!
Reviews.Author: DAPHNE
Reviews.Content: The phone has some kinks but overall it works fine, I kept it & will make the best of it. I hate sounding so uninspired, but my experience was somewhat disappointing.

Reviews.Title: After market
Reviews.Author: Christopher Trembly
Reviews.Content: Good price, wish they would of told me it had after market back.  But for the price I paid, I knew there had to be some type of alteration

Reviews.Title: never again
Reviews.Author: Cody
Reviews.Content: i will say it openly, i hated this device. i had my droid, and after many problems, i decided to try my luck and get this. if you hav ever used android devices, coming to this is awful. syncing previous items thru itunes was a pain, and the os simply feels too simple. the device itself felt like it had to be handled carefully otherwise it would break. i will recommend it for someone new to smartphones, or who has never had android before. its a good beginner device, just did not fit my complex needs.
